description: Number of nonnegative integer n X n matrices with sum of elements equal to n; polynomial symmetric functions of matrix of order n.
references: E. R. Cavalcanti and M. A. Spohn, On the applicability of mobility metrics for user movement pattern recognition in MANETs, in Proceeding MobiWac '13 Proceedings of the 11th ACM international symposium on Mobility management and wireless access, Pages 123-130, ACM New York, NY, USA 2013, ISBN: 978-1-4503-2355-0 doi:10.1145/2508222.2508228
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 19 2000
